name: Dirt Simple Servlet Example
description: This servlet web app says hi to you by name when you are logged in.

STORMPATH_API_KEY_ID.description: The API key ID from your ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_API_KEY_SECRET.description: The API key secret from tyou ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_APPLICATION_HREF.description: The fully qualified URL to your Stormpath Application from the admin console

STORMPATH_BASEURL.description: The base url, including the version, from the STORMPATH_APPLICATION_HREF. Ordinarily, you will not need to changed the default
